front.title: Synthetic IV (SIV) for non-AES ciphers and MACs

abstract.t: This document specifies how the Synthetic Initialization Vector (SIV) block cipher mode of operation can be adapted to non-AES ciphers and message authentication codes (MACs), with block sizes and MAC tag sizes other than 128 bits. Concrete instantiations are defined using the XChaCha20 nonce-extended stream cipher combined with HMAC-SHA256.
